text: Cordelia Fine (born 1975) is a Canadian-born British academic psychologist and writer. She is a professor of gender studies, moral psychology and neuroethics at Melbourne Business School, Australia. Her first book, Delusions of Gender, was published in 2010. Fine was born to the children's writer Anne Fine and professor Kit Fine in Toronto. Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:British psychologists
title: Cordelia Fine
